text: Tom Vandenkendelaere (born 2 September 1984 in Roeselare) is a Belgian politician who served as a Member of the European Parliament (MEP) for the Christian Democratic and Flemish party (CD&V;), which sits in the EPP Group, from 2014 until 2019. He succeeded Marianne Thyssen, who became European Commissioner. Vandenkendelaere was member of the Committee on Economic and Monetary Affairs (ECON), the "Panama Papers" Inquiry Committee (PANA) and the delegation for relations with the People's Republic of China. Vandenkendelaere was chairman of the CD&V; youth wing from 2013 to 2014. ==External links== * Personal website ==References== Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:People from Roeselare Category:Christen-Democratisch en Vlaams MEPs Category:MEPs for Belgium 2014–2019
title: Tom Vandenkendelaere
